content.text:
# Draft:Queens Reunited

"Queens Reunited" is the thirteenth episode of the tenth season of the American television series ''RuPaul's Drag Race''. It originally aired on June 21, 2018.
Episode
The contestants return for a reunion. Discussions include Vanessa Vanjie Mateo becoming a viral sensation, memorable lip-sync performances, and The Vixen's confrontations. The discussion about The Vixen prompts her to leave the stage. The eliminated contestants say who they think deserves the crown.
Reception
The A.V. Club gave the episode a rating of Aâˆ’.
